price: Yet you did what you did[7], and you are extremely ungrateful.”
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: [7] i.e., striking the Copt in support of a man from your people, who died as a result.
